actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Transportation to designate an additional 6.25 miles of highway connecting I-10 and I-65 near Mobile-Prichard, Alabama, as part of the Interstate Highway System.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Transportation to designate six and one-quarter miles of highway connecting I-10 and I-65 near Mobile-Prichard, Alabama, as a route on the National System of Interstate and Defense Highways. Prohibits such six and one-quarter miles of roadway from being charged against the limitation for the National System of Interstate and Defense Highways.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Transportation to designate an additional 6.25 miles of highway connecting I-10 and I-65 near Mobile-Prichard, Alabama, as part of the Interstate Highway System.
